value:
$WmMPID_ロイ,ch02_00_Roy_M_Normal,Face|So this gigantic vortex...is our
enemy, then...$k$p$WmMPID_水着リリーナ,ch02_03_Lilina_F_Swim19,Face|There he is, Wolt!$k$p$WmMPID_水着ウォルト,ch02_19_Walt_M_Swim19,Face|Lord Roy!$k$p$WmMPID_ロイ,ch02_00_Roy_M_Normal,Face|Lilina! Wolt! I'm happy to see you're
both safe.$k$p$WmMPID_水着リリーナ,ch02_03_Lilina_F_Swim19,Face|Yes, but...are we the only ones here?
I haven't seen anyone else...$k$p$WmMPID_水着ウォルト,ch02_19_Walt_M_Swim19,Face|Is this really something we can
handle on our own, Lord Roy?
Just the three of us?$k$p$WmMPID_ロイ,ch02_00_Roy_M_Normal,Face|I believe we can. It'll be just like old
times. Things have worked out thus
far—I don't see why they'd stop now!$k$p$WmMPID_水着ウォルト,ch02_19_Walt_M_Swim19,Face|Hm... Just like old times, huh?$k$p$WmMPID_ロイ,ch02_00_Roy_M_Normal,Face|Right! Remember when Cecilia taught
us about the art of battle during our
time studying abroad?$k$pThe three of us all fought side by side
during those sessions, remember?
We've been trained for this!$k$p$WmMPID_水着ウォルト,ch02_19_Walt_M_Swim19,Face|Now that you mention it, that does
ring a few bells...$k$p$WmMPID_水着リリーナ,ch02_03_Lilina_F_Swim19,Face|That really brings back memories...
By working together, it felt like we
were able to overcome anything!$k$p$WmMPID_ロイ,ch02_00_Roy_M_Normal,Face|Exactly. And that's why, if we work
together like that again...$k$p$WmMPID_水着リリーナ,ch02_03_Lilina_F_Swim19,Face|We can definitely take care of some
vortex in our way!$k$p$WmMPID_水着ウォルト,ch02_19_Walt_M_Swim19,Face|That's right! I'm ready to face it
head-on now, after all this talk!$k$p$WmMPID_ロイ,ch02_00_Roy_M_Normal,Face|In that case, let's go! Into the eye of
the vortex!$k$p

$WmMPID_水着リリーナ,ch02_03_Lilina_F_Swim19,Face|The vortex finally seems to be
dissipating...$k$p$WmMPID_ロイ,ch02_00_Roy_M_Normal,Face|Good. Then all our efforts were not
in vain.$k$p$WmMPID_水着リリーナ,ch02_03_Lilina_F_Swim19,Face|Just like the old days... Except you're
much stronger now than you used to
be, Roy...$k$pYou've come a long way from the
absent-minded boy I trained with
when I was young.$k$p$WmMPID_ロイ,ch02_00_Roy_M_Normal,Face|I appreciate your kind words, Lilina,
but...I have a long way to go yet.$k$pWithout my friends to support me,
I'm nothing. And I'll be the first to
admit that.$k$pMy success now still depends on
you, Wolt, and the others—same as
it's always been.$k$p$WmMPID_水着リリーナ,ch02_03_Lilina_F_Swim19,Face|How kind of you to say, Roy...$k$p$WmMPID_水着ウォルト,ch02_19_Walt_M_Swim19,Face|Lord Roy... You honor me.$k$p$WmMPID_ロイ,ch02_00_Roy_M_Normal,Face|It's the truth! Now...should we start
heading back?$k$p$WmMPID_水着リリーナ,ch02_03_Lilina_F_Swim19,Face|Yes! Let's go—together.$k$p
